trigger: The active metabolite of vitamin D , 1 , 25-dihydroxyvitamin D3 [ 1 , 25 - ( OH ) 2D3 ] , is a potent regulator of human monocyte / macrophage function in vitro .
The active metabolite of vitamin D , 1 , 25-dihydroxyvitamin D3 [ 1 , 25 - ( OH ) 2D3 ] , is a potent regulator of human monocyte / macrophage function in vitro .

To establish a model for 1 , 25 - ( OH ) 2D3 regulation of human monocyte monokine synthesis , three human cell lines ( U-937 , THP-1 , and HL-60 ) were examined for : 1 ) the presence of functional 1 , 25 - ( OH ) 2D3 receptors ; 2 ) the accumulation of <extra_id_0> interleukin-1 beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> IL-1 beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) mRNA and <extra_id_0> IL-1 beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> protein in response to lipopolysaccharide ( LPS ) ; and 3 ) the regulation of this response by 1 , 25 - ( OH ) 2D3 .
